    • Method Detail

      • validateColor

        public static void validateColor(java.lang.String color)
                          throws InvalidValueException
        Determine if a color is supported by CSS. This method only supports a subject of CSS (yet). (1) 173 CSS extended color names, (2) #RRGGBB or #RGB, where R, G and B are red, green, blue values as hexadecimal digits. This method does not check for null because null has special meaning.
        Parameters:
        color -
        Throws:
        InvalidValueException
